text: His Girl Friday is a 1940 American screwball comedy drama romance movie directed by Howard Hawks and based on the 1928 play The Front Page by Ben Hecht and Charles MacArthur. It stars Cary Grant, Rosalind Russell and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:1940 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies about journalists
